overview.heading: Riverside Virtual Office
overview.body: Enjoy the benefits of a prestigious Riverside business address without the cost and commitment associated with a physical office space. Opus VO provides you with an unparalleled opportunity to base your enterprise in a prime Riverside location, all without the burden of a traditional office lease. Utilize our state-of-the-art conference rooms for high-stakes business negotiations and customer interactions, while simultaneously enhancing your brand’s image with a reputable Riverside address.  When you opt for a virtual office in Riverside through Opus VO, you also receive the specialized service of a live receptionist. Focused on delivering bespoke, top-quality customer service, our professional team ensures each client interaction is finely tuned to align with your individual business goals. Delegate routine administrative duties such as complete mail management and nuanced call-forwarding to us, freeing you to concentrate on your business’s growth and evolution.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Riverside, California even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Riverside. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within California.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Riverside virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Riverside?
sections.body: Riverside is more than just a picturesque Southern California city; it’s a thriving business center with opportunities spanning various sectors like healthcare, technology, and education. Perfectly positioned near key business areas, our Riverside office enables seamless access to crucial industry connections and lively networking events.  By electing to use an Opus Virtual Office in Riverside, you’re doing far more than reducing overhead costs; you’re obtaining a vital competitive edge. Propel your business to new heights by taking advantage of our superior virtual office services today.  Opus VO Riverside @ 8175 Limonite Avenue, Riverside, CA 92509
